frontmatter.title: Can I use my phone to live stream with Reactive?
frontmatter.metaTitle: How to use a phone to live stream with Reactive
frontmatter.metaDesc: How to easily use a phone to live stream with the Reactive Shopify app

pageProps.content:
Currently, the live selling tools that come with the Reactive Live Shopping app are only available for desktop. However, You can still use your phone as the video source/camera for all of your Reactive live streams. You can use any app on iOS or Android that broadcasts in RTMP.

To get started, [find your stream key and server url](/support/how-can-i-find-my-stream-key-and-the-reactive-server-url/). Then, choose an app from the links below and follow the guides to configure the app to broadcast to Reactive.

## iOS

* Streamlabs
  * [App Store link](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/streamlabs-live-streaming-app/id1294578643)
  *  Open the app and select the menu from the top left-hand corner > Account settings and Login.
  * To broadcast from the Stream labs app to Reactive, open the app and select the menu from the top left-hand corner > Account settings > Custom RTMP server. Then put in your stream key and the Reactive server URL. Finally, to start broadcasting, return to home > press the "GO LIVE" button > select Custom RTMP server as the destination > add whatever name and description you'd like > then press the "Go Live" button at the bottom of the page to start broadcasting. Below is a video to walk you through:
    * ![streamlabs-mobile-to-reactive](/blog-assets/support-assets/streamlabs-mobile-to-reactive.gif)
* Zoom
  * [App Store Link](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/zoom-cloud-meetings/id546505307)
  * [Walkthrough](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001777826-Livestreaming-meetings-or-webinars-on-a-custom-site#h_4b4ded3d-3f6b-4965-baaa-3692f947e36c)
* OBS Camera
  * [App Store Link](https://obs.camera/)

## Android

* Streamlabs
  * [Play store link](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.streamlabs&hl=en_US&gl=US)
  * To broadcast from the Stream labs app to Reactive, open the app and select the menu from the top left-hand corner > Account settings > Custom RTMP server. Then put in your stream key and the Reactive server URL. Finally, to start broadcasting, return to home > press the "GO LIVE" button > select Custom RTMP server as the destination > add whatever name and description you'd like > then press the "Go Live" button at the bottom of the page to start broadcasting. Below is a video to walk you through:
  * ![streamlabs-mobile-to-reactive](/blog-assets/support-assets/streamlabs-mobile-to-reactive.gif)
* Zoom
  * [Play Store Link](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=us.zoom.videomeetings&hl=en_US&gl=US)
  * [Walkthrough](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115001777826-Livestreaming-meetings-or-webinars-on-a-custom-site#h_4b4ded3d-3f6b-4965-baaa-3692f947e36c)
